name: DwarfCorp
description: Build a colony of ruthless capitalist Dwarves in a strange fantasy land.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X 9 Compatible Video Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Not Required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated GTX 860 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
